BEGIN_STEP1: SRP To begin, you will need to install an authenticator application on your phone. Some options are:

ADD_REALMARKET_ACC: SRP-You’ll need to add a RealMarket account in your authenticator app.
TWO_METHODS: SRP-You can do that using either of these 2 methods:
IMPORTANT-STEP3_1: SRP-IMPORTANT: Back up your recovery codes!
IMPORTANT_STEP3_2: SRP-Backup your 6 digit codes and put it in a safe place. If your phone gets lost, stolen, or erased, you will need these codes to get back into your RealMarket account! Recovery codes are one time use only! Without these codes, the only way to regain access will be to contact our

ALL_SET: SRP-You're all set! From now on, every time you log into your RealMarket account, you will be asked to enter your password first followed by the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

CAMPAIGN_DETAIL1:
Dajte informacije publici da sazna detalje o Vasoj kampanji, ciljevima,
 o vremenu u kome planirate prikupiti sredstva, kao i koliko ste kapitala spremni dati.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL2:
SRP-Creating a brand identity is a crucial first step in marketing your campaign.
 Uploaded images should be Max. file size: 4MB. Accepted formats: JPG, PNG
CAMPAIGN_TITLE3: SRP-Tell us about your campaign in short.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL3:
SRP-Unlock the investors golden treasure just in a few seconds.
 Convince audience that your campaign is a perfect match for everyone.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL4: SRP-Inform investors of the problem your start up purports to solve.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL5:
SRP-Inform investors, prospective and current, of the problem your start up purports to 
 solve.
CAMPAIGN_TITLE6: SRP-Tell us about market you targeting
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL6:

 is enough of such to make a profitable company.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL7:
SRP-Inform investors of how your start up purports to sell something 
 people are already buying or at least interested in.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL9:

 core competencies are.
CAMPAIGN_DETAIL11:
SRP-Inform investors of who you compete with and what your competitive advantage over 
 them are.

ABOUT_INFO: SRP-RealMarket aims to redefine the concept of equity crowdfunding by providing a secure and transparent environment for the entire investment procedure. Our main mission is to support growth-focused businesses finding the right investors. We offer our investors a versatile collection of innovative projects that we personally believe in.
ABOUT_TEAM: SRP-Behind RealMarket is a fast-growing team of experts devoted to delivering a superior service. We are a fintech company made up of highly experienced professionals in the fields of technology, economics, fundraising, and marketing. Our interest and skills are diverse, but we are united by a common goal - to connect genuine investors with the best business opportunity.
JOIN_US_INFO: SRP-If you would like to join our team of talented and passionate people, please feel free to contact us at
FOOTER_TEXT1: The Information About the Investment Opportunities Profiled on This Website Is Provided for General Information and Marketing Purposes Only and Should Not Be Considered an Invitation or Inducement to Engage in Any Investment Activity.
FOOTER_TEXT2: You Should Ensure You Carefully Read the Risk Disclosure Statement Before Deciding to Proceed With Any Investment.
INVEST_IN:
Investirajte u inovativne kompanije i pospešite 
 profitabilnost svog poslovanja!
OWN_PIECE:
Postanite vlasnik udela kompanije 
 u koju verujete!
OWN_PIECE_TEXT:
Kolektivno investiranje udelima predstavlja ponudu akcija privatnih kompanija 
 grupi pojedinaca u zamenu za investiciju. Jednostavno rečeno, 
 kolektivno investiranje udelima omogućava investiranje u inovativna 
 preduzeća od njihovog samog nastanka.
START_INVESTING_TEXT1: RealMarket podržava široki spektar inovativnih projekata. Naša baza sadrži kampanje iz različitih poslovnih sektora (finansijskih tehnologija, zdravstva, obrazovanja, održivog razvoja, i dr.).
START_INVESTING_TEXT2: Platforma investitorima nudi siguran i brz način ulaganja bez bilo kakvih dodatnih naknada. U momentu kada unesete željeni iznos investicije, platforma će automatski da izračuna iznos udela za koje stečete pravo.
START_INVESTING_TEXT3:
Podržavajući startap zajednicu imate direktan uticaj na budućnost poslovne kulture.
Ako od samog početka postanete deo inovativne kompanije, povećavate svoju šansu za društvenu i finansijsku dobit.
START_INVESTING_SUBTITLE1: 1. Pronađite kompaniju čiju biste ideju podržali.
START_INVESTING_SUBTITLE2: 2. Napravite nalog - bez nadoknade za investitore.
START_INVESTING_SUBTITLE3: 3. Podesite svoj nalog i finansirajte inovaciju!
RAISE_FUNDS_TEXT1: Ako imate revolucionarnu ideju, ne oglevajte da svoj projekat podelite sa nama. Nakon prihvatanja predloga Vaše kampanje, pomoćićemo Vam da na najefikasniji način prođete kroz proces prikupljanja sredstava, kao i da pronađete pravu/adekvatnu investiciju.
RAISE_FUNDS_TEXT2: Postavite odgovarajuću dokumentaciju kao dokaz Vašeg kredibiliteta. Ispričajte svoju priču. Ukratko opišite svoju kompaniju. Podelite svoju viziju uključujući i Vaše planove za budućnost.
RAISE_FUNDS_TEXT3: Kako biste privukli pažnju potencijalnih investitora kreirajte i pažljivo uredite stranicu svoje kampanje. Brendirajte svoju priču i pomozite da i drugi prepoznaju Vašu viziju.
WE_CARE_TEXT: Naša misija je da obezbedino bezbednu i sigurnu platformu koja pojedincima pomaže u unapređivanju njihovog poslovanja.
ACTIVE_NETWORK_TEXT: Naši investitori žele da investiraju u inovativne kompanije. Raspolažemo sa aktivnom mrežom investitora u koju ubrajamo stotine investitora, anđele investitore i VC fondove.
SUPPORT_TEXT1: Potrebna Vam je pomoć? Kontaktirajte nas putem e-pošte na
SUPPORT_TEXT2: ili nas pozovite na broj telefona
SECURE_TRANSACTION_TEXT: Budući da se RealMarket pridržava XY propisima i regulativama, svojim korisnicima omogućava sigurne i bezbedne investicione transakcije.
INVEST_CARD_TEXT: Podržite budući tehnološki napredak kupovinom udela u najinovativnijim kompanijama.
RAISE_FUNDS_CARD_TEXT: Unapredite svoje poslovanje tako što ćete pronaći ljude koji veruju u Vašu viziju.
INFO_SUCCESS_SCREEN: Dear user, Your fundraising application has been sent.
INFO_FAILURE_SCREEN: Dear user, Your fundraising application has been failed.
USER_KYC: Your investor application is almost complete. Go through KYC verification to complete it.
USER_KYC_PENDING: This option is not available yet, as your KYC documentation is still under review. Please be patient, we will get back to you soon.
PLEASE_LOGIN: Please sign up in order to proceed
INVESTMENT_REQUEST_SENT: Vas zahtev za investiranje je poslat
CAMPAIGN_ENDING_SUBTITLE: Want to end this campaign? This operation cannot be undone. Mark the campaign state and proceed.
